name: Trata
headline: Database of investment research from anonymous hedge fund analysts
description: Trata is a crowdsourced database of stock analysis, written by anonymous hedge fund analysts. We compress the “first cut” of research from 3 hours to 3 minutes with 1-2 page notes.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:finance; industry:b2b; industry:databases; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Alexander Chen, Co-Founder/CPO
founders.description: Co-Founder/CPO of Trata. Previously, Senior Software Engineer at Titan (YC S18, a16z), engineer 7 at Medallion (Sequoia), and engineer at Oscar Health. UCLA CS

founders.name: Eric Cho, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder/CEO at Trata (W2025). Previously a technology investor at a L/S hedge fund. Cornell grad.

raw_markdown='[trata.](https://www.trytrata.com/</>)[Sign In](https://www.trytrata.com/<sign-in>)
# Discover the Narratives that Drive Markets
The world’s largest database of investment research written by anonymous hedge fund analysts.
[Book a Demo](https://www.trytrata.com/<https:/calendly.com/eric-trytrata>)
![Thinker](https://www.trytrata.com/images/thinker.webp)
Backed by
![Y Combinator](https://www.trytrata.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fycombinator-logo.png&w=1920&q=75)
January 20, 2025
Announcing our pre-seed round
We are excited to announce that we have raised a pre-seed round from Y Combinator and CIOs/Partners/Senior Analysts from 5+ institutional hedge funds.
## Turn over 10X more rocks in record time
Trata identifies and aggregates “tension points”: the 1-3 key points of debate whose outcome will drive a company’s valuation over the next twelve months. Sourced from verified Analysts who have already done the legwork.
## Product Features
Identify companies that fit any framework
Digest the key points in two minutes
Scan the important parts of public documents
![Identify companies that fit any framework](https://www.trytrata.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fequity-list-page.png&w=3840&q=75)
![Identify companies that fit any framework](https://www.trytrata.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fequity-list-page.png&w=3840&q=75)
![Digest the key points in two minutes](https://www.trytrata.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fequity-detail-page.png&w=3840&q=75)
![Scan the important parts of public documents](https://www.trytrata.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fdocument-detail-page.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Frequently Asked Questions
### How does this work?
### What about compliance?
### Why do I need this?

generated_description:
**Trata: Revolutionizing Investment Research**

Trata, founded in 2025 and part of Y Combinator's W25 batch, is a San Francisco-based startup that aims to transform how investors approach research. Their mission is straightforward yet profound: to create a crowdsourced database of investment research written by anonymous hedge fund analysts, allowing users to make informed decisions more efficiently.

Imagine compressing three hours of stock analysis into a digestible 1-2 page note that you can read in just three minutes. That's the magic of Trata. By identifying and highlighting the "tension points"—the 1-3 critical issues that will shape a company's valuation over the coming year—they help investors focus on what truly matters, saving them time in the research-heavy world of finance.

**Key Features:**
- **Rapid Insights:** Companies are evaluated through a quick scan of essential arguments that matter most.
- **Framework Flexibility:** Users can identify companies that meet various investment frameworks.
- **Document Scanning:** Important parts of public documents are quickly summarized, ensuring nothing crucial is overlooked.

Currently, Trata’s team consists of just three employees, and they are led by Brad Flora as their Group Partner. Their work is tagged under categories like artificial intelligence, SaaS, finance, and databases, indicating their tech-savvy approach to a traditionally labor-intensive field.

Trata recently raised a pre-seed round from Y Combinator and senior analysts across multiple institutional hedge funds—validating their innovative model and backing from industry heavyweights. They offer a demo through their website, which users can book [here](https://www.trytrata.com/) to experience this revolutionary service first-hand.

However, it's important to note that Trata is not a registered investment advisor, and they stress the importance of personal due diligence before making any investment decisions.

In a nutshell, if you’re looking for a smarter way to sift through vast amounts of investment research without losing hours of your day, Trata might just be what you're looking for. 

For more information, check out their website at [trytrata.com](https://www.trytrata.com/).
